sub_title: Owner and CEO of CoHort Consulting, Amsterdam, The Netherlands.
summary:
Owner and CEO of CoHort Consulting, Amsterdam, The Netherlands: Business Development, Interim Management and Marketing Support for the international Horticulture and Food Industry sectors.
Experienced in General and Sales Management in export-oriented Agri- and Food business. Proven history of successful activities in supply of technology and services to investors/ producers of food crops, soft fruits and ornamentals. Skilled in negotiation, international business management, account management and greenhouse project development. Experienced in organizing practical training programs in horticulture, for both students and investors' operational staff.
Strong professional, holding an M.A. from Leiden University with combined studies at the Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University. Has been operating for 8 years (2011-2019) out of Beijing, China. Presently focusing on East and South-East Asia and the Middle East/Gulf Region. Associates and partners in Beijing, Shanghai, Hong Kong, Seoul, Bangkok, Singapore, Kuala Lumpur, Manila, Jakarta, Dubai and Cairo.

profile_positions.description:
Consultancy / business development / representation in China and East Asia, focusing on modern horticulture and food industry. 
Technology, Education & Training, Human Resources, Marketing/Branding.

Main principals/customers, 2014-2019:

 - Ministry of Economic Affairs (RVO), The Netherlands / Royal Netherlands Embassy, Beijing - Report on the Chinese market for cut flowers and other ornamentals (published 2019).
 - Lentiz Education Group, The Netherlands - Contact person in China/East Asia. Practical training programs in modern horticulture and related subjects. Target groups: university and college students, and project operators in new high-tech greenhouse projects. Lentiz Group is a founding father of the World Horti Center (WHC) in The Netherlands.
 - VNU Exhibitions Asia, Shanghai, China - Involved in setup of Horti China Trade Fair & Conference (since 2017). Coordinator of the Holland Pavilion.
 - Ministry of Economic Affairs (RVO), The Netherlands and Royal Netherlands Embassy, Seoul - Report on the South Korean market for cut flowers (published February 2020).
 - Investors in large, modern Greenhouse projects in China - 'new' players in the Chinese market for fresh vegetables, fruits and ornamentals, often already active on a large scale in real estate, industry and trade.
 - IMGPR Flower Parks & More, The Netherlands - Development and design of 'Flower & Horticulture theme parks' in China/Asia.
 - Dümmen Orange China Co. Ltd., Shanghai, China - Large Dutch breeder of ornamental crops. Interim job (9 months) as Commercial Manager, leading a Chinese sales team..
 - Axia Vegetable Seeds, The Netherlands - Dutch breeder of vegetable seeds. Strategic development of its Chinese joint venture.
 - iBulb, The Netherlands - Promotion office of the Dutch flower bulb sector. Improvement of their network in China. 

Speaker / forum member at many professional seminars and congresses in China, Japan, South Korea, Thailand and The Netherlands.

profile_positions.description: Focus on East and South-East Asia and the Middle East. profile_positions.description:
* PRIVA International Beijing ("Priva Asia") is a regional branch office of PRIVA BV of The Netherlands. The Beijing office was first established in 2005.
 * Products: 
 - Integrated computer systems for control of greenhouse climate, irrigation/fertilizing and all other technical installations.
 - Automated irrigation and fertilizing units for greenhouse cultivation.
 - Management information systems for greenhouse production.
 * Core services: supply and commissioning of PRIVA products - support and training programs for end users and authorized PRIVA distributors.
 * Additional services: project engineering, consultancy.
 * The PRIVA Beijing office is responsible for China & Taiwan, Japan, Korea, Mongolia and the ASEAN-countries of South East Asia.
 * During the period of my responsibility, business has flourished and the office staff doubled.
 * In February 2014 I decided to pursue new Asia-related activities, based on my experience and network in international horticulture and food industry.
profile_positions.title: General Manager Priva Asia Beijing / Sales Manager East Asia

profile_positions.description:

 * Smiemans Projecten BV, Naaldwijk, The Netherlands (2008-2011). Specialized greenhouses and other constructions for botanical gardens, research institutes, zoos, leisure parks and retail (reference project: "The Glasshouse" at the Royal Horticultural Society - Wisley Gardens, UK).
